Name: Animaddicts
About the game: Animaddicts is an arcade game for 1-4 players. The gameplay of Animaddicts is creative and each player can throw a ball at the enemies to transform to a ball. An enemy partially transformed in ball cannot move until it dissolve ( shakes it off ). Features and Content Two Characters to choose and play All level are procedurally and ramdomly generated to add more randomness to each gameplay. Full Controller Support Controller Support This game has Full Controller Support.
